00024 #ifndef __OPENNSL_L2_H__
00025 #define __OPENNSL_L2_H__

00027 #include <opennsl/types.h>
00028 
00029 #define OPENNSL_L2_DISCARD_SRC  0x00000002 
00030 #define OPENNSL_L2_DISCARD_DST  0x00000004 
00031 #define OPENNSL_L2_L3LOOKUP     0x00000010 
00032 #define OPENNSL_L2_STATIC       0x00000020 
00033 #define OPENNSL_L2_TRUNK_MEMBER 0x00000080 
00034 #define OPENNSL_L2_MOVE_PORT    0x00100000 
00035 #define OPENNSL_L2_CALLBACK_DELETE      0          
00036 #define OPENNSL_L2_CALLBACK_ADD         1          
00037 #define OPENNSL_L2_CALLBACK_REPORT      2          
00038 #define OPENNSL_L2_CALLBACK_LEARN_EVENT 3          
00039 #define OPENNSL_L2_CALLBACK_AGE_EVENT   4          
00040 #define OPENNSL_L2_CALLBACK_MOVE_EVENT  5          
00041 
00042 typedef struct opennsl_l2_addr_s {
00043     uint32 flags;                       
00044     uint32 reserved1; 
00045     opennsl_mac_t mac;                  
00046     opennsl_vlan_t vid;                 
00047     int port;                           
00048     int modid;                          
00049     opennsl_trunk_t tgid;               
00050     opennsl_cos_t reserved2; 
00051     opennsl_cos_t reserved3; 
00052     opennsl_multicast_t reserved4; 
00053     opennsl_pbmp_t reserved5; 
00054     int reserved6; 
00055     int reserved7; 
00056     opennsl_fabric_distribution_t reserved8; 
00057     int reserved9; 
00058     int reserved10; 
00059 } opennsl_l2_addr_t;
00060 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00061 
00062 #define OPENNSL_L2_CACHE_CPU        0x00000001 
00063 #define OPENNSL_L2_CACHE_DISCARD    0x00000002 
00064 #define OPENNSL_L2_CACHE_BPDU       0x00000010 
00066 typedef struct opennsl_l2_cache_addr_s {
00067     uint32 flags;                       
00068     uint32 station_flags;               
00069     opennsl_mac_t mac;                  
00070     opennsl_mac_t mac_mask;             
00071     opennsl_vlan_t vlan;                
00072     opennsl_vlan_t vlan_mask;           
00073     opennsl_port_t src_port;            
00075     opennsl_port_t src_port_mask;       
00077     opennsl_module_t dest_modid;        
00078     opennsl_port_t dest_port;           
00079     opennsl_trunk_t dest_trunk;         
00080     int prio;                           
00081     opennsl_pbmp_t dest_ports;          
00083     int lookup_class;                   
00084     uint8 subtype;                      
00085     opennsl_if_t encap_id;              
00086     opennsl_multicast_t group;          
00087     opennsl_ethertype_t ethertype;      
00088     opennsl_ethertype_t ethertype_mask; 
00089 } opennsl_l2_cache_addr_t;
00090 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */

00831 typedef struct opennsl_l2_station_s {
00832     uint32 flags;               
00833     opennsl_mac_t dst_mac;      
00834     opennsl_mac_t dst_mac_mask; 
00835     opennsl_vlan_t vlan;        
00836     opennsl_vlan_t vlan_mask;   
00837 } opennsl_l2_station_t;
00838 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00839 
00840 #define OPENNSL_L2_STATION_WITH_ID  (1 << 0)   
00841 #define OPENNSL_L2_STATION_IPV4     (1 << 2)   
00843 #define OPENNSL_L2_STATION_IPV6     (1 << 3)   
00845 #define OPENNSL_L2_STATION_ARP_RARP (1 << 4)   
00847 /***************************************************************************/
